emi.info.custom_nether_portal:
Build a portal frame using Steel Blocks (minimum 4 wide × 5 tall, corners optional).
Right-click the inside with Flint and Steel to ignite.
This portal uses the Custom Portal API and supports Create trains passing through (minimum 3×3 portal size for tracks).
emi.info.custom_end_portal:
Build a portal frame using Black Steel Blocks (minimum 4 wide × 5 tall, corners optional).
Right-click the inside with an Ender Eye to ignite.
This portal uses the Custom Portal API and supports Create trains passing through (minimum 3×3 portal size for tracks).
